Paperclip Lampshade: Cut out a circle of paper and place a small LED light inside it. Use the paperclip to hold the light in place and attach it to a small battery. The paperclip can act as a makeshift lampshade, providing a unique and eco-friendly lighting solution.

Paperclip Plant Marker: Write the name of each plant on a paperclip and use it as a marker in your garden or greenhouse. The paperclip can be easily moved around as needed and will be more durable than a traditional plastic marker.
Paperclip Bookmark: Bend a paperclip into a unique shape and attach a small piece of paper with a quote or message. Use it as a bookmark in your favorite book, adding a personal touch.
Paperclip Zipper Pull: Cut a small slit in the center of a paperclip and attach a small piece of string or yarn to the top. Use it as a zipper pull for your jacket or bag, adding a touch of whimsy.
Paperclip Sculpture: Use paperclips to create a small sculpture or sculpture. Bend and twist the clips into different shapes and connect them together to create a unique piece of art.
